review.title: Amazing staff
review.reviewText: The staff is very friendly and informative. Nice location, easy to walk almost everywhere.
review.positiveRemarks: Great location, clean rooms, good breakfast
review.negativeRemarks: Quantity of food available for breakfast for those going for breakfast late.

review.title: Excellent hotel close to the Piers
review.reviewText:
I had a great time at the hostel!!!
I can totally recommend it! Friendly staff, the rooms are clean and the location is perfect because it is really close to Fishermans Warf for example.

review.title: Great location for travelers
review.reviewText:
It is next to Chinatown.  If you stay in the main building with many young people, it could be a little noisy.  If you stay in the Annex which is the building two blocks East, it is very nice and quiet.  It is perfect for two people.

Hotel is not new, but well maintained. For a solo traveler, it is about $150 per night.  This is what you pay in San Francisco. Other hotels in the area are not as nice as this unless you wish to pay $200 per night.
review.positiveRemarks: Location, location and location.  It is easy to eat, shop, and walk around.  In Chinatown, you can buy fruits and vegetables.
review.negativeRemarks: Price is high for solo traveler
review.locationRemarks: It is easy to eat, shop, and walk around.  In Chinatown, you can buy fruits and vegetables.

review.title: Characterful and friendly central hostel
review.reviewText: I had a single room. And though that was not much different in price to a hotel the friendliness of staff and fellow travellers, and the washing facilities and evening meals, and being walking distance from great places made it worth it. The room was a bit worn, but generally clean and the bed very comfortable. A real wide age range of travellers shared experiences over breakfast.

managementResponses.response:
Thanks Hannah, we are so happy you enjoyed your time with us.  We understand the noise level at dinner.  We want people to feel comfortable and will note this concern when musicians perform.  We hope to see you again soon!
Cheers,
Green Tortoise Management

review.title: Safe, professional, like family.
review.reviewText: All the little details are taken care of at Green Tortoise, displaying the level of experience they have serving all sorts of travellers. The highlight of my stay was helping out cooking dinner for the free dinners they have MWF. Great way to meet people and spend an evening! Would have loved the live music to be quieter -- it was difficult to hold a conversation -- but that may just be personal taste. Thanks for the great experience and on point pizza recommendation.
clean, free breakfast, good location, free Wi-Fi, free computers for internet
review.locationRemarks: 20mins to pier39, 30mins to AT&T park, 15mins to coit tower, on foot

managementResponses.response:
Hello dear Traveler,
The Green Tortoise Hostel is located in North Beach (Little Italy) and next to Chinatown.  We are in a vibrant area full of cafes, bars and restaurants and also in an Entertainment District.  It can get noisy on the weekends and during peak season because of the clubs on the street.  We have many different room types if you  also want that little bit of extra privacy.
Thanks for reviewing us,
Best,
Green Tortoise Front Desk

review.title: every thing is OK except too noisy in the night
review.reviewText: not sound proof, kind of noisy during the night, both outside and inside the room (some roommates snored loudly

managementResponses.response:
Fantastic feedback!  We really do try to have something for everyone here, from great free food to fun events and a home away from home atmosphere.  We love families traveling with their kids that are accustomed to staying in hostels so we cater to all generations.

Best, GT Management

review.title: Great for all tastes
review.reviewText:
Great hostel, very nice vibe, whether you want to party or not.
I was travelling solo and didn't go there to party etc. and there was more than enough ways of finding quiet spaces to just relax.
The staff was extremely helpful and friendly, calling for me to make reservations and explaining where to find fun stuff to do.
There were even families staying there! I'll def go back there if I'm in the area.
Top hostel!
review.positiveRemarks: Amazing staff, free healthy breakfast every morning, access to kitchen and fridge, very large lockers that can fit my enormous amount of luggage...

managementResponses.response:
Thank you very much for the review! We cater especially well to the solo traveler by creating a global community where people can exchange travel stories and learn about different cultures. We hope to see you again soon.

Best, GT Management

review.title: European style hostel in the heart of SF!
review.reviewText: I found this hostel a perfect stay for single travelers who enjoy independence and self reliance. Accommodation is adequate and atmosphere is relaxed. Daily free breakfast and every other day free dinner add to an almost college dormitory like experience. Overall, it was a delightful and pleasant stay.

managementResponses.response:
Hi Don,
Happy we were the perfect fit for you and your stay here in San Francisco. Our free breakfasts and dinners are helpful on the hip pocket and a great way to meet fellow travelers.

See you again soon,
Best,
Green Tortoise Front Desk

review.title: Perfect for my needs
review.reviewText:
Working in city this week and needed a bed. Perfect. 
Cool clientele, too.
